name: cz-jira-smart-commit-fr
description: Un adaptateur commitizen pour Jira smart commits

scripts.release: npm run test && with-package git commit -am pkg.version && with-package git tag pkg.version && git push && npm publish && git push --tags
scripts.release:beta: npm run release && npm run tag:beta
scripts.tag:beta: with-package npm dist-tag add pkg.name@pkg.version beta

author: Steven Par√©
